p: The observation of callus was done on a weekly basis. At the end of four weeks, the formed callus was isolated from the explants. The data for callus induction in each treatment was recorded in which the morphology, fresh, and dry weights (g) [ 76]. The percentage of callus initiation was calculated [ 30]. Thereafter, the content of total saponin was evaluated and characterization on HPTLC and CMS.
